about_the_game:
In a world on the brink of a catastrophic war between Chaos and Order, the students of the prestigious Academy of Magic are bracing themselves for an epic battle. Amidst the turmoil, Erika, a promising young witch, finds herself accused by the Wizards Tribunal of being a spy for the Extremists. This leads to her unjust imprisonment, further plunging the magical world into chaos.

Adding to the turmoil, Vertigo, the once-revered Chancellor of the Academy of Magic, has been dethroned and is desperately trying to avert the impending war. With the fate of the magical world hanging in the balance, a new generation of young wizards must rise to defend their realm.

Erika and her loyal companions are about to embark on a treacherous journey across diverse realms, seeking allies and a long-lost, powerful artifact that could shift the tide of the looming conflict. Join Erika as she delves into the unknown, braving perilous encounters and challenges, all in a bid to save the magical world from impending doom!

FEATURES:

✨ Return to the universe of the Academy of Magic and visit several other worlds with Erika.
✨ Experience a Time Management game in an unforgettable magical setting.
✨ Help Erica Erika manage the balance between the Magic of Order and Chaos across 60 levels with unique gameplay.
✨ Find out if the heroines will be able to prevent a cruel war in 120 thrilling cutscenes
✨ Collect diamonds to restore the forgotten headquarters of the Magic of Order to its former glory
✨ Get ready for secrets and surprises that go far beyond the world of Magic Academy.

In Arcane Arts: Sorcerer's Quest, you will be tasked with helping Erika in her various magic classes. Grab items and combine ingredients into wonderful new creations and spells. But be warned—everyone has limited patience, including teachers and students! Manage your time and actions well to earn rewards. Perform well to receive stars from your classmates and diamonds to decorate your dorm room.
